regex.name: get-hls
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re
headers0 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0'} url0= 'http://api.mivo.com/v4/web/channels' source0= requests.get(url0, headers=headers0) m3u8= re.findall('sctv","dataUrl":"(.*?)"', source0.text)[0]
headers1 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Authorization': 'BY-TrgLgK0NMzXb_JB_81DfeOxK_SNH7'} url1= 'http://api.mivo.com/v4/web/channels/wms-auth' source1= requests.get(url1, headers=headers1) wms_auth= re.findall('"sign":"(.*?)"', source1.text)[0] url2 = m3u8 + wms_auth source2= requests.get(url2, headers=headers0) maxbitrate= re.findall('(http.*)', source2.text)[0]
return maxbitrate
